original_text: Who said unto his father and to his mother, I have not seen him; neither did he acknowledge his brethren, nor knew his own children: for they have observed thy word, and kept thy covenant.
korean_text: 그는 그의 부모에게 대하여 이르기를 내가 그들을 보지 못하였다 하며 그의 형제들을 인정하지 아니하며 그의 자녀를 알지 아니한 것은 주의 말씀을 준행하고 주의 언약을 지킴으로 말미암음이로다

sentences.original_text: Who said unto his father and to his mother
neither did he acknowledge his brethren
for they have observed thy word
